results.description: Front End Developer Sheffield Adria Solutions has a fantastic opportunity for a number of Front End Developers with experience in Angular to join a well-established company near Sheffield, South Yorkshire. The duties of Front End Developer will include but not be limited to: Develop software solutions to agreed timescales, standards, and KPIs. Build on existing web service development using the appropriate languages and technologies Ensure that the appropriate quality of development and documentation is achieved through the understanding and adoption of best practices in appropriate software development techniques, including coding standards. Provide timely and accurate estimates for delivery of projects, BAU requests, and bugs. Liaise with appropriate technical contacts to create new solutions and improve existing ones. The ideal Front End Developer will have experience of: HTML, CSS, Javascript Angular Mobile & cross-browser design SQL Benefits: Hybrid working Training budgets Good pension scheme If you are interested in this position, don't miss out Click Apply without delay Front End Developer Sheffield, South Yorkshire.

results.description: Front-End Developer Liverpool £40k Front-End Developer, JavaScript, Angular, Front End, Ruby, MySQL, ReactGit, Python This advanced development team based in Liverpool are looking to add a Front-End Developer to their software delivery team. You will be joining a team of software developers working on their current product suite within an Agile/Scrum environment. They offer a clearly defined career path with an excellent benefits package. Ideally you will have a computer related degree and will have a demonstrable commercial experience of multiple programming languages including strong front-end experience using Angular and ideally some Ruby experience on the backend. Core skills & experience for the Front-End developer role include: Strong front end experience using Angular MySQL database experience Ideally backend experience using Ruby Experience with PHP/Python/ReactGit is beneficial Demonstrable experience of working on the full development lifecycle within an Agile team This is an excellent opportunity for a Front-End Developer looking to take the next step up in their development career with an organisation that will fully support and encourage your career aspirations. Please send your cv for consideration as they are looking to move quickly. Front-End Developer, JavaScript, Angular, Front End, Ruby, MySQL, ReactGit, Python Send your CV to Alex or call 0161 438 1177 Please follow us on twitter erinassociates for similar roles Erin Associates Ltd is acting as an Employment Agency in relation to this vacancy.
results.title: Front End Developer
Front End Developer
results.description: Front End Developer (React JavaScript) Remote Working Are you a talented and skilled Front End Developer with strong React skills who enjoys working with a range of tech? You could be progressing your career at leading edge technology company and working on complex, technically rewarding systems across the front end tech stack, within a supportive environment that promotes continual learning. Your role: As a Front End Developer you'll join a multi-disciplinary business and aligned Agile Tribe with a strong focus on a JavaScript/React UI dashboard for their SAAS platform. Joining an established team, as a Front End Developer, you will design and develop new features and enhancements on an exciting cloud based product that has been developed for a large scale clients. As a Front End Developer you will earn a competitive salary up to £50k plus benefits including pension, private medical care, life assurance, dedicated weekly training sessions, Friday afternoons off work once a month and many more. The role is fully remote (WFH, Work from Home) and has zero requirement to attend an office. Front End Developer Requirements: JavaScript/Typescript specifically React JS experience is essential. UI, UX, CSS and HTML best practices. Experience of UI/UX design and development. Source Management software Bitbucket or similar. API architecture experience. Experience with testing (Cypress, Playwright, Jest, React testing library) Hands-on experience of agile software development practices and methodologies. Knowledge of a Test-driven approach. If you are a React Front End Developer and looking for a rewarding new challenge, apply now or an immediate interview.

Front End Developer with strong React application development experience is sought on a hybrid basis by a market leading software house based near Worcester. With a 15-year pedigree of crafting market leading ERP, CRM and logistics management software this Front End Developer will be joining a dynamic, entrepreneurial team are the forefront of innovation within the commercial sector. This Front End Developer would be joining the multi-disciplinary new product team of 11 who are tasked with building complex, highly scalable applications, and MVP' due for release in 2023. With a real commitment to employee wellbeing and personal development this Software Engineer can expect long term commitment to remote, flexible working and a clearly defined training & progression scheme. This Front-End Developer based near Worcester should have most of the following key skills: - 2 years plus of commercial application development experience - Strong React experience - Git version control - JavaScript and Typescript understanding - AWS deployment exposure - Any SPA development experience would be a plus - Experience working in a product led, agile environment would be really useful This Front-End Developer based near Worcester will receive: - £45,000 - £55,000 DoE - long term hybrid working (2 days a week on site) - Flexible working hours - Annual salary review - Private healthcare - Private pension scheme - Training and personal development budget and time allocation - Extensive career progression opportunities - 25 days holiday plus bank holiday with holiday buy & sell scheme So if you are a Front End Developer who likes the idea of building greenfield applications within an autonomous, innovative team then please apply now to be considered. Front End Developer Worcester £45,000 - £55,000 React, Git, Typescript, SPA, AWS, JavaScript

results.description: NEW OPPORTUNITY FOR A JAVASCRIPT AND REACT WHIZZ TO JOIN A GLOBAL CONSULTANCY TO WORK ON SOME PUBLIC SECTOR ACCOUNTS Permanent opportunity for a Front-End Developer Offices based all over the UK 1 or 2 days a week on-site (this is flexible) Base salary up to £64K ?WHO WE ARE? We are recruiting a permanent Front-End developer to join a brilliant team of Developers, Testers, Project Managers and Scrum Masters who work on engaging content management, digital marketing and e-commerce solutions for clients in the public sector The projects range in size and length, so variety is a key aspect here. Our teams work in an Agile environment, and continuously strive to stay up to date with modern tech and best practises. WHAT WILL YOU BE DOING? We are looking for someone to join the team and hit the ground running, with that in mind we are looking for someone with digital customer experience to be an active member of our agile development team. We are looking for someone who can collaborate with other developers and help lead the progress and delivery of engaging web, mobile and tablet experiences. We're offering a great base salary and career progression opportunities, in a global organisation. Theres never been a better time to get involved THE FRONT-END DEVELOPER SHOULD HAVE. An active SC clearance is essential Experience across the JavaScript tech stack, with strong preference towards React and Angular Experience using SASS or another CSS pre-processor Demonstrable experience in Test Driven or Behaviour Driven Development Experience working with cloud technologies ideally AWS Experience of working in agile teams and delivering optimised integrated web solutions BENEFITS Generous training and development budget Biannual salary reviews Progression opportunities Opportunity to cross train Bupa Healthcare, Childcare Vouchers, Travel Insurance, Dental Cover, Gym Pass Sponsorship through eDV clearance if interested TO BE CONSIDERED. Please apply by clicking online. results.description: Lead frontend developer £90,000 - £100,000  bonus East London / Hybrid Global Music company Looking for an exciting opportunity to take your frontend development skills to the next level? Look no further than our global music company, where we're seeking a talented lead frontend developer to join our team Responsibilities: Primary responsibility maintaining and developing / architecture over the entire frontend domain. You'll be responsible for overseeing a team of frontend developers, ensuring that all code is clean, efficient, and easy to maintain. You'll also be tasked with designing and implementing new features, working closely with our product team to ensure that everything we build meets the needs of our users. In addition to your technical skills, we're looking for someone who is passionate about music. Requirements Strong track record 5years experience as a hands-on Lead developer JavaScript focused, with understanding of backend technologies. Experience working with external web service integrations, such as API driven SaaS solutions. Advance experience with modern frameworks such as React and NextJS Must have technical proficient with, HTML/CSS, ES2020, React, Storybook You'll need to be able to work independently and as part of a team and be comfortable communicating with stakeholders at all levels of the organization. This is a great opportunity to join a dynamic and fast-growing company that's making waves in the music industry. Next steps, how to apply. If you wish to be considered for this position or require more information about this opportunity? Please apply now.

results.title: Front End Developer

results.description: Purple Media is looking for a Front-End Developer to join our Award-Winning team in Northampton Working with our in-house experts to provide creative digital content to established brands and blue-chip companies. The ideal candidate will thrive in an environment where the answer is never no. About Us: Here at Purple Media, we dont just make eLearning content, we write, design, animate, film, build and bring to life content that supports companies all over the world: from Vodafone and Colgate to DHL and IHG. Our team are a fun and enthusiastic bunch who are passionate about what they do. As well as encouraging a work life balance, we offer our employees many different perks such as buying breakfast for the team on Fridays, early finishes on Fridays, and team drinks. Were looking for a fun individual who will be a great asset to the company. About the role: Youll be a key part of the team with involvement from the start to delivery of a product. Specifically focusing on designing and delivering customer solutions, identifying new features, and developing innovative ideas. Youll pride yourself on quality whilst building testable, bug-free and scalable code by following SOLID principles and software coding best practices. Youll also work closely with the Project Manager to determine timescales for projects and ensuring deadlines are met. Were a small team who work hard and celebrate our successes. Youll be a part of this team, which means having the right attitude and self-motivation to get stuck in, is essential. Key responsibilities: To develop, and maintain the frontend architecture of our applications Responsible for writing clean, efficient, and maintainable code using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS To collaborate with the backend developers to integrate the frontend with the backend To ensure cross-browser compatibility and responsiveness of the user interface To optimise the performance of the frontend systems to ensure scalability and efficiency To keep up to date with emerging trends and technologies in frontend development Qualifications and Experience 2 years front end development experience Strong knowledge of JavaScript, HTML, and CSS Experience with at least one frontend framework such as Vue, jQuery, or React Experience with version control systems such as Git What we need from you: To be technically curious and eager to learn Proactive in self-learning and problem solving A team player Excellent attention to detail Great organisation and time management Comfortable in a fast-paced environment Adaptable to change, especially with priorities Good verbal and written communication Intrigued? If youre excited by what youve read, wed love to meet you, contact us now to find out more. Please note, we dont offer working from home and would require you to be in the office

Technical - React, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Node.js, GraphQL, WordPress, PHP, AWS (ECS, RDS, CloudFront, Route 53, S3, X-Ray, Docker, and Terraform. results.description: Front End Developer (Security Systems, WPF) Macclesfield / Hybrid 50% On Site £65,000 - £75,000  Company Benefits Are you a Front-End Developer looking to work on some of the most cutting edge security systems? Are you interested in Smart Buildings, Super Yachts and IoT Projects? On offer is the chance to join a rapidly growing and well-funded start-up, they have created next generation security systems that have a very simple user interface, this allows the product to be replicated and used across multiple sites, without the need of an expert to operate it. This company has been exhibiting their product for the last 12 months and generated a huge amount of interest, with investment secured already they have multiple offers for additional funding and order requests already based on the Proof of Concept. This business is looking for someone that wants to quickly springboard your career from Developer to Head of Division over the course of 2 years, you have the opportunity to quickly grow and build your own team. THE ROLE: Help Develop the WPF Front End to make a more robust system Contribute ideas to the software developments roadmap Progress into one of the Management team THE PERSON: A Front-End developer with a passion for creating clean code Wanting to be part of a startup with an exciting 2023 roadmap Keywords: WPF, Azure, SQL, RabbitMQ, Back End, Backend, Back-End, Full Stack, Full-Stack, If you're interested in this role, click 'apply now' to forward an up-to-date copy of your CV. We are an equal opportunities employer and welcome applications from all suitable candidates. The salary advertised is a guideline for this position. The offered renumeration will be dependent on the extent of your experience, qualifications, and skill set. Front End Magento Developer
results.description: Front-End Magento Developer - Wrexham (Hybrid) - GBP 25,000-55,000 DOE A new and exciting position has recently become live with a leading global supplier in their industry. They searching for a passionate and career-driven Front End Magento Developer with commercial experience to join their IT team on a permanent basis. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing and developing custom themes, extensions, and interfaces for the Magento e-commerce platform. You will work closely with the development team to ensure that the website is optimised for maximum speed and efficiency while delivering a seamless user experience. This is a hybrid role that will require you to go to the Wrexham office 1-2 times a week and therefore you will need to live and have the full right to work in the UK Technical Skills: Magento 2 JavaScript HTML CSS JavaScript Libaries Sass PHP Responsibilities: Design, develop, and maintain custom themes, extensions, and interfaces for our Magento e-commerce platform Collaborate with our development team to ensure that the website is optimized for maximum speed and efficiency Work closely with our UX designers to ensure a seamless user experience across all devices Develop and maintain documentation for all front-end code and integrations Ensure the website is cross-browser compatible and adheres to web accessibility standards Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in front-end development and Magento e-commerce platform Requirements: At least 2 years of experience in front-end development with a focus on Magento and E-commerce. Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP Experience with e-commerce platforms Experience with Magento 1.x and 2.x Experience with Magento front-end development tools such as LESS and SASS Strong understanding of responsive web design and web accessibility standards Experience with Git version control system Ability to work independently as well as collaboratively in a team environment Excellent communication and interpersonal skills URGENT ROLE - IMMEDIATE INTERVIEWS - FAST OFFERS If you have experience in the above and you're interested in this amazing opportunity, please apply with your most up-to-date CV or get in touch with me on 0161 552 7931. Role: Front-End Magento Developer Location: Wrexham Salary: GBP 25,000- 55,000 DOE Keywords: Magento, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React js, Vue js, Require js, Sass, PHP, Gulp, e-commerce, Front End Developer, Magento Developer, Front End Magento Developer, Software Engineer, Software Developer BeTechnology Group Limited is acting as an Employment Agency in relation to this vacancy.

results.description: We are looking to recruit a Front End Developer to join a large company in Manchester. The successful candidate will be responsible for developing web applications and user interfaces using React and JavaScript. The role requires the Developer to be able to work collaboratively with a team, as well as independently when necessary. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of React and JavaScript and HTML, as well as being able to write clean code. The Company are on a mission to make is simpler, easier and more cost-effective to make and research development claims in the UK. Our Company are the World’s first to do what they do. Our Company has built a platform that has helped start ups and scale ups to secure millions of cashback from the government and it doesn’t cost an arm and a leg either. National Winner of the Tech Nation Rising Starts 2022, also won the GP Bullhound most innovative Company in the North West. Rated number 1 on Trustpilot in the industry. The successful candidate will be responsible for developing and maintaining web applications and user interfaces, ensuring that they are secure and up-to-date with the latest technology. The Developer must be able to troubleshoot and debug any issues that may arise, and be able to provide technical support. Salary and hours Negotiable, depending on experience Monday to Friday 8.30am till 5.30pm Really close to Piccadilly train station and Tram station Hybrid Working Key Responsibilities: Developing web applications and user interfaces using React and JavaScript Debugging and troubleshooting any issues with web applications Writing and maintaining clean code Providing technical support Working collaboratively with a team Technical Skills: Proficient in React and JavaScript Python, Django, React Native Knowledge of HTML and CSS Ability to write clean code Understanding of web security Experience with debugging Knowledge of web development best practices Keywords: React Developer, Frontend Developer, Web Developer, JavaScript Developer

results.description: Summary Working for a globally recognised brand, you be responsible for the front-end development of the Company’s websites and customer facing digital interfaces. As the internal resource, you will be expected to quickly develop a full understanding of the current tech stack and be able to deliver, advise and innovate on the future customer facing digital interfaces. This role will be office based however remote working may be offered for the right candidate. General duties to include: Through interaction with the Digital partner, you will add value and expertise to the design and front-end build phases of all the customer facing digital projects Use HTML, CSS and JS to build responsive web-based interfaces Develop scalable, flexible and reusable components Ensure technical feasibility of functional specifications Thoroughly test your work before delivery to the QA team Provide regular progress reports, raising any issues as soon as they arise Estimate work, giving timescales and highlighting any identified risks Provide input during project and team meetings Participate in code reviews Working in collaboration with other teams across the business including Creatives, Brand Teams, Project Managers and Developers Create the level of polish and interaction that brings a design to life and makes a user experience great Keep up to date with emerging technologies Supports the development and completion of test plans Key Skills and Experience: A minimum of 3 years’ experience as a Front-end developer (Agency experience desirable) An online portfolio of demonstrable web-based interfaces Experience in delivering headless ecommerce front-ends Solid experience writing clean, semantic HTML Experience working in a PHP environment Strong proficiency in modern front-end technologies such as React, Angular or Vue.js Solid experience in writing modular and maintainable JavaScript (ES6) Demonstrable experience of working with web services and APIs Ability to debug and resolve cross-browser/ platform issues Solid technical background with an ability to address accessibility and compatibility issues Strong communication skills Experience with Github or other source control software Only suitable candidates will be directly contacted about this position and we will not store or process the data of candidates in any way unless consent has been obtained.

Please either apply by clicking online or emailing me directly to . If unavailable, please leave a message and either myself or one of my colleagues will respond. By applying for this role, you give express consent for us to process & submit (subject to required skills) your application to our client in conjunction with this vacancy only. Also feel free to connect with me on LinkedIn, just search Ryan Baker.?I look forward to hearing from you JAVASCRIPT / REACT / REACT.JS / MICROSERVICES / AWS / AGILE / TDD / MOBILE / WEB / NSD

results.description: Front End Developer Are you looking for a role in Scottish software house that can offer variety, challenges and excellent opportunity to further develop technical skills? You will work on the front end with a tec stack that includes HTML, CSS, JavaScript/Typescript, JQuery and Vue.JS, React Native. It is steeped in culture, has an amazing Mediterranean climate and diverse working practices. With English being the main language and visa applications streamlined why not make the move? You can also work remotely if preferred. Our client, a player in the gaming industry, is recruiting a Front End Developer to join their growing Tech Team. Working closely with other team members in developing a front End that attracts players to the company's site, the ideal candidate will be responsible for: Writing well designed, high quality, maintainable code together with any necessary documentation. Taking ownership and responsibility of own work starting from the design process up to delivery. Following good software engineering practices always encouraging a culture of knowledge sharing and collaboration. Communicating ideas and solutions with both technical and non-technical colleagues. Working with backend engineers to design awesome APIs. Front End Developer Experience: A minimum of 3 years working experience in Front-end technologies Strong experience in ES6 , React , React Hooks , Redux , Webpack , and preferably Typescript . Strong experience in basic web technologies such as HTML , JavaScript , CSS . Experience in REST services . Experience in source code version control systems with GIT experience. Experience in Unit and Continuous Integration testing. Experience in building scalable web applications. Experience with Agile (Scrum, or Kanban) Development. This is a fantastic opportunity. If you are interested, please submit your CV for immediate consideration. Thank you. Ref - Front End Developer 44 Front End Developer
results.title: Front End Developer

results.description: At Evora Global we are a passionate and talented team that share a common set of values and want to make a difference to stop the negative effects of climate change. Our mission is to accelerate the evolution of real estate sustainability to enhance the wellbeing of the planet and its people. We are looking for a React/JavaScript Developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming. Responsibilities will include implementing visual elements and their behaviours with user interactions. You will work with both front-end and back-end web developers to build all client-side logic. You will also be bridging the gap between the visual elements and the server-side infrastructure, taking an active role on both sides, and defining how the application looks and functions. It is essential that you have: Strong understanding of JavaScript, its quirks, and workarounds Strong understanding of ReactJS, Redux or other state management tools on complex SaaS (Software as a Service) products Good understanding of unit testing in React using tools such as Jest or React Testing Library Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around such issues Good understanding of web markup, including HTML5 and CSS3 Familiarity with JavaScript module loaders, such as Require.js and AMD Familiarity with front-end build tools, such as Webpack Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git Good understanding of browser rendering behaviour and performance Experience of developing in a CI/CD process Effective communication skills, with a good command of English in both speaking and writing to both technical and non-technical staff, as needed We have offices in both London and Birmingham and offer a hybrid working model. If you have the key skills and experience we seek, and would like to learn more about this opportunity, we'd love to hear from you

results.description: Front-End Developer (JavaScript Engineer/Software Developer) Salary £45,000 - £75,000 Location - London Type - Permanent One of the World's largest and most respected financial institutions is seeking talented Front-End Developers to contribute to its financial and digital solutions portfolio for its millions of valued customers. These technologically focussed solutions will help to streamline and assist businesses and individuals on a daily basis worldwide, ultimately improving their digital banking experience. As a Front-End Developer you will envision the design and implementation of these services on behalf of this Multinational and Universal Bank. What you will do as a Front-End Developer - Create technology solutions to meet business requirements, in line with business strategies. Develop technologies to build innovative, intuitive and user-friendly digital solutions. Collaborate with the relevant Architects, Designers, Back-End Developers and Project Managers to help with the creation of appropriate designs. Essential Requirements of a Front-End Developer - Excellent knowledge of Front-End technologies including; JavaScript, Node, HTML5, CSS3. Experience with front-end frameworks e.g. React, Angular, Vue. Understanding of existing technology infrastructure across all major functions and a comprehensive grasp of emerging technologies. Understanding of web performance and how to optimise this by minimising load times, reducing the size of files, and improving site speed. Expertise in creating responsive and adaptive designs for digital mobile and web applications. Experience of software delivery and deployment patterns (e.g. Continuous Delivery, Continuous Integration, etc.). Knowledge of technologies (including infrastructure) that are used by financial service providers. Understanding of APIs. Experience of agile structures and working in an agile environment. Salary and Benefits of a Front-End Developer - Salary £45,000 - £75,000 (experience dependent) Annual Bonus (20%) 10% Pension 25 Days Holiday Entitlement (Buy or sell Up to 5 Days) Private Medical Cover Excellent Training & Development Company Share Options Hybrid working Do you think you have what it takes to deliver technologically comprehensive End-2-End solutions as a Front-End Developer to enhance the user experience of millions of UK and Global customers? If so, I invite you to apply. Advert Reference: AMC/PBO/FEJSBNH

results.description: Front End Developer (REACT JS, REACT/ TAILWIND/ JAVASCRIPT/ TYPESCRIPT/ HTML/ CSS) The opportunity I am delighted to say that a client that I have worked with since I first joined Reed over 12 years ago, have asked me to help to recruit for their ever-expanding development team. When I first started working with this business, they had one floor of a shared office, but I could see they had clear plans for success. Today they have 2 separate multi floored offices in the UK, not to mention their Global expansion with offices in Germany, Asia and the USA. This is a fantastic opportunity to join a company where technology is vital in all they do and where innovation and new ideas are actively encouraged. As their front end developer, you will have the opportunity to work on a wide range of projects, internal and external facing. Their tech stack allows them to use the most appropriate technology for the project while allowing them to use continuous deployment and improvement processes to see projects through to deployment and beyond. They are working remotely but they would like you to be able to get to their Midlands office, ideally once a week (But this can be negotiated) Key duties as the Front End Developer are: ? Leading or taking part in the entire lifecycle of a project, from ideation to deployment and everything in between.? Working alongside UX/UI designers to iterate and feedback on the design lifecycle.? Feedback into the Design Ops process to improve our Design to Development handoff process.? Building campaign landing pages.? Running split tests.? Browser compatibility tests.? Ensuring the web design is optimised for smartphones and tablets.? Optimizing web pages for maximum speed and scalability. Essential skills/ experience needed as the Front End Developer include:  Proven experience in HTML, CSS and Javascript Comfortable working with the full software delivery cycle Experience with front end frameworks like Tailwind, React JS etc The ability to build dynamic front end experiences using cross-browser technologies So if the idea of joining a Global company where despite massive success has not forgot its roots, a company where the directors still believe in knowing everyone's first name and a company where your opinion counts. If you said yes to all of the above then apply with an up to date CV for immediate interview

results.description: Front End/UI Developer - Green-tech - Remote - £55k Do you want to work for a Green-tech organisation that are accelerating a global energy transition to net zero? Avanti recruitment are working with a Green-tech, global Energy body that brings energy expertise together around the world. They are a unique network spanning across Energy, oil and gas and innovative renewable energy technologies. The company are building a knowledge centre aimed at the energy sector, to provide the skills that are helping us to consume it better, and develop the good practice needed to keep it safe and secure. They do this by: Developing and equipping the future energy workforce Advising decision-making professionals through data and analytics Producing lower carbon energy, in a more efficient and safe way With a brand new Greenfield website build happening right now, they need an experienced Front End Developer to join the team on a remote basis and take ownership of the project. As the Front End Developer you will be creating dynamic data visualization graphs and charts for web applications. You’ll liaise with the Head of Digital and other stakeholders throughout the project, so great communication and delivery skills are essential. You’ll have the autonomy and independence to work with the framework you want to work with (within Javascript), and make technical business decisions. You’ll be responsible for setting and delivering high-quality, clean code that performs seamlessly cross-browsers. This role can be predominately remote, with 1 day a month visits to the office in central London. Key skills: - HTML - CSS - Javascript - UX/UI - SASS - Bootstrap Along with £55k salary they also offer the following benefits: - 25 days annual leave  bank holidays - Generous pension contribution - 37.5 hour working week - Every other Friday off - Training budget - Participation in industry events, including attending conferences and lectures If this Front End Developer role is of interest please apply for more information.

Our client is looking to empower the vison and goals that they have by creating a culture where individuals of all backgrounds feel comfortable in bringing their best selves to work. They are looking for Front End Developers with experience in some or all of the following (full training will be provided to fill any gaps in your skill set): Angular14, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, Jest, React.js, jQuery, SASS/SCSS, AWS and Vue.js The Front End Angular position comes with the following benefits: Hybrid working (2 days in the office / 3 days working from home) 28 days annual leave (plus bank holidays on top) Option to buy or sell a further 5 days of leave Matched pension contributions up to 8% Excellent training programme Private health insurance Group life assurance Wellbeing fund that contributes £25 per month towards an activity that promotes your mental or physical wellbeing Annual profit related bonus (historically about £3,000 per annum) Significant investment in your learning and development Company provided breakfasts, fruit, beer fridge and soft drinks Regular company funded socials and away day Location: Bristol - Hybrid Working Salary: £30,000 - £60,000  Bonus  Pension  Benefits To apply for this position please send your CV to Nimesh Henarath at Noir. results.description: Front End Developer - Global Fitness Movement - London (Tech stack: Front End Developer, JavaScript, jQuery, HTML5, CSS3, Angular, KnockoutJS, BackboneJS, React, VueJS, Typescript, Web, UI, UX, User Interface, User Experience, Front End Developer) Born in 2012 in California, our client began development on an app and website that made finding and booking classes effortless for fitness goers across the state. The company is now changing how people live their lives, bringing together a community of enthusiasts, helping people find the activities that make their true selves come alive or supporting small businesses and studios across the entire globe. They believe that being active is the key to living a happy and healthy life. Our client is now active in over 15 countries and continues rapid growth on a yearly basis. It takes a team to make things happen and this team includes some of the most talented Front End Developer (JavaScript, jQuery, Angular) in the industry. They don't just have the best developers - but also the best karaoke stars, community activists and amateur chefs. Together, they are making the world an active place, which makes every day pretty damn gratifying. They are looking for Front End Developer with experience in some or all of the following (full training will be provided to fill any gaps in your skill set): JavaScript, LESS, SASS, ES6, jQuery, HTML5, CSS3, Angular, KnockoutJS, BackboneJS, React, VueJS, Typescript and AJAX. All positions come with the following benefits: Annual bonus. Free medical, dental and vision coverage. Flexible work hours. £5,000 training allowance. Healthy (and unhealthy) snacks. Charitable giving programs. Virtual team classes, events and happy hours. There is no 'I' in team. By working with talented individuals and developing upon innovative ideas, the team continues to succeed and grow. They are a global movement with big plans for the future. It's an incredible opportunity so if you're interested, act and apply today Location: London, UK / Remote Working Salary: £80,000 - £100,000  Bonus  Pension  Benefits NOIRUKTECHREC NOIRUKREC NC/FELON80100

results.description: Role: Front-End Developer Location: Burnley, Lancashire- Hybrid working 2-3 days in the office. Salary: up to £35k (DOE) Benefits: Rapid Career acceleration- Training and professional development Fun and friendly working environment with a very supportive team and ambitious business. Team bonding socials with office break out area including pool table and refreshments (beer fridge ??) 31 days annual leave No time for boredom as you get the opportunity to work on a wide variety of projects Hybrid working model Mental health support programme…and many more Our client is an exciting digital marketing agency supporting businesses in areas such as branding, content marketing and web design with their energetic team of in-house industry experts. The team of specialists develop exceptional systems to make businesses more productive and cost effective which has allowed them to work with a variety of national and international businesses. As a result of new client opportunities, this fast-paced business is looking for a Front- End Developer to join their ever growing software team. Responsibilities: Being part of a great team of developers you will be working on a variety of projects such as e-commerce websites, CRMS & CMS'. Work closely with Back-End Developers to successfully deliver project outcomes Responsible for front- end design and layouts Create front- end logic and leading front-end biased projects. Work and create new features/ pages without a starting visual design Your profile: 2  years' experience in a Front- End Developer role Experience and knowledge of working with one of the JavaScript frameworks Experience and knowledge of HTML, CSS and JavaScript SASS and collaboration platforms (GitHub) experience Ability to communicate with clients providing feedback and making adjustments until they are happy with the outcome. Nice to haves: PHO for Wordpress Lavarel, Vue, Tailwind For more information then please contact som3 Recruitment directly If you feel you have what it takes, then 'Apply' and one of our consultants will be in touch 2023 is your year ??
